newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Highlights of Friday's Commission briefing.
newsitem.headline: Highlights of Friday's Commission briefing.

text.p: Following are highlights of the midday briefing by the European Commission on Friday:

Commission spokesman Thierry Daman said in response to a question that the Commission was checking a report in The Guardian on Friday that Britain had evaded EU rules to stop the spread of bovine spongiform encephalopathy (BSE) to the continent (see upcoming MADCOW-BRITAIN).
The Commission released the following documents:
IP/96/801: Commission approves the creation of GrantRail - a British Steel/Volker Stevin joint venture for railway construction and maintenance.
IP/96/802: Commission clears the joint acquisition of InfraLeuna by Linde and Domo.
